attributes.action: To make Milton Keynes Dons FC remove the Dons part from their name!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that Milton Keynes Dons FC should be made to remove the Dons part from their name.

The Dons part comes from WimbleDON!!!

They should just be called Milton Keynes FC!!!

I cant believe they were even allowed to have the Dons part in there name after being allowed to change their name from Wimbledon, Its a total joke!!!

After killing off Wimbledon FC, Why should they be allowed to have anything associated with Wimbledon!!!

Even Players who played for Wimbledon FC hate it when people refer to them as Playing for Milton Keynes Dons FC... Its not the same team!

The name has changed and the club badge has changed!!!

Sign this petition if you think Milton Keynes Dons FC should be called Milton Keynes FC!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
